resources.string: Loading data from the web, this could take a couple minutes...

This is created by Chris Sebesta, a NYC Cyclist, for NYC Cyclists.

This app visualizes motor vehicle collisions that involve injured or killed cyclist so that bicyclists can make informed decisions about the routes they choose and their safety. 

 This app was built using the NYC Open Data located at: https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Public-Safety/NYPD-Motor-Vehicle-Collisions/h9gi-nx95 

This is free open source software and the source code can be found at: https://github.com/zebesta/NYC-Cycle-Map
